name: lm_or_logreg
Description: Fit a standard linear model to regression problems and a logistic model to classification problems. Results for this inducer should be interpreted with care for datases of size 100 with a large number of features.

name: ridge_lm_or_logreg
Description: Fit a L2-penalized linear model to regression problems and L2-penalized logistic model to classification problems. For each combination of (DGP, n), a reasonable lambda parameter was found beforehand and then used for all 500 replications of an experiment.

name: decision_tree
Description: A regression or classification tree as implemented in the rpart R package.

name: random_forest
Description: A random forest with 50 trees as implemented in the R package ranger.
